mutants.code:
def calculate_shortest_distances_after_roads(n, initial_distances, planned_roads):

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n):
                a = mat[i][y] + mat[x][y] + mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x += 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // 2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

def calculate_shortest_distances_after_roads(n, initial_distances, planned_roads):

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)

            for j in range(n):
                a = mat[i][y] + mat[x][y] + mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // -2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

def calculate_shortest_distances_after_roads(n, initial_distances, planned_roads):

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n):
                a = mat[i][y] + mat[x][y] - mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // 2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

def calculate_shortest_distances_after_roads(n, initial_distances, planned_roads):

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n):
                a = (mat[i][y] + mat[x][y]) * mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // 2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n):
                a = mat[i][y] + mat[x][y] + mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] - mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // 2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

                b = (mat[i][x] + mat[x][y]) * mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):
            for j in range(n):
                a = mat[i][y] - mat[x][y] + mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
                c = mat[i][j]
                mat[i][j] = min(a, b, c)
        return mat
    mat = [row[:] for row in initial_distances]
    results = []
    for road in planned_roads:
        (x, y, w) = road
        x -= 1
        y -= 1
        mat = update_distances(mat, x, y, w)
        sum1 = sum((sum(row) for row in mat)) // 2
        results.append(sum1)
    return results

    def update_distances(mat, x, y, w):
        mat[x][y] = mat[y][x] = min(mat[x][y], w)
        for i in range(n):

                a = mat[i][y] * mat[x][y] + mat[x][j]
                b = mat[i][x] + mat[x][y] + mat[y][j]
